bike.description: Alpha Gold Aluminum w/semi-integrated head tube, shaped, formed & gusseted down tube, reinforced seat tube, ISCG 05 mounts, bolt-on forged horizontal dropouts, convertible to standard derailleur hanger

components.description: Formula DH92 20mm 32-hole alloy front hub, Formula DC42N 36-hole rear hub; Alex FR30 disc rims
3-pc. chromoly tubular, 48 spline, 175mm w/28T Black Label alloy ring
Bontrager Low Riser OS, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Hayes MX-5 mechanical disc brakes w/Tektro levers
